entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 late this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023
